property.name: Catcme_text_11
property.default: Would you like to help fund scientific research?
property.label: Would you like to help fund scientific research?

property.name: Catcme_text_12
property.default: Your donation is greatly appreciated (and tax deductible too). The TGen Foundation, a non-profit organization, fuels biomedical research that positively impacts the lives of patients and their families. Please, visit the TGen Foundation site and contribute to help further such research efforts. Thank you in advance for your support.
property.label: Catcme_text_12

property.name: Catcme_text_13
property.default: Yes, I'd Like To Know More
property.label: Yes, I'd Like To Know More
